SKTaskScheduler
This abstract class is the base class for all task schedulers.
SKTaskSchedulerCron
 
SKTaskSchedulerFixedNumber
 
SKTaskSchedulerFixedRate
 
SKTaskSchedulerMBean
 
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy
A scheduling policy for a task.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.Cron
Cron: The task will be executed at a fixed time of the day.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.FixedNumberOfTimes
FixedNumberOfTimes: The task will be executed a fixed number of times
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.OneTime
OneTime: The task will be executed after a fixed delay.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.Periodic
Periodic: The task will be executed periodically after a fixed interval.
SKTaskWrapper
A wrapper for SKTask that holds the state of the task.
SKTaskWrapperMBean
 
SKThreadFactory
This class is used to create threads for the task scheduler.
SlowPrintSKTask
Simulates a task that chronically takes a long time to execute.
SlowPrintTestTask
 
StalledSKTask
 
TestSchedulerShutdown
